define ('DB_USER', "root");
define ('DB_PASSWORD', "spartan01");
define ('DB_DATABASE', "hng_fun");
define ('DB_HOST', "localhost");

$conn = mysqli_connect(DB_HOST, DB_USER, DB_PASSWORD, DB_DATABASE);
 
if(!$conn){
  die("Connection failed:". mysqli_error());
}


?>
